attributes.additional_details:
I am very angry to find out that the Macmillan Advice worker post is being axed at the end of March 2012. The Gateshead CAB, have attempted to source funding for all other resources but have been unable to do so.

This service is vital to the people of Gateshead, especially at a vulnerable time of life, this cannot happen, as it will cause undue stress and anxiety. Please all sign this so the DOH, are forced to fund this service for an indefinite period
